title: Do you ever get suprised by your own damage when playing?
body:
Like for example, in my last game I was playing Diana and I hit my Q onto the enemy Kalista.

Now I knew I was going to delete her pretty easily. I was, however, not expecting to drop 80% of her health with a single R proc with just Runeglaive and Abyssal.

I felt a little disgusted about what just happened.

Then I typed "Rekt" in all chat and felt better.
